title: MyFonts Poster Banner
content:
I love the new poster banner format at Myfonts. This is for an upcoming release.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201041100im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PATRIOTbANNER500_3704.jpg)

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201041100/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
author: phrostbyte64

comments.content: I love the Patriot banner! You really nailed the Marvel look.
